common.title: 2026 Two Weeks in China (240h Visa Free)
common.description: In-depth analysis and operation guide for 240-hour (10-day) visa-free transit policy, covering visa, transportation, payment, and itinerary planning.
common.footer_note: This guide is based on the latest policy announced in January 2026.

hero.subtitle: In-depth analysis and operation guide for the 240-hour (10-day) visa-free transit policy, covering essentials for your trip.

policy.title: Policy Core
policy.card_twov_p1: As of Jan 2026, the Transit Without Visa (TWOV) policy has been unified and extended to 240 hours.
policy.card_twov_p2: This is a strategic shift from simple transit to in-depth tourism.
policy.card_twov_list2: Must hold connecting tickets to a third country/region
policy.card_unilateral_desc: More flexible unilateral visa-free policies for countries like FR, DE, IT, SG, MY, TH.

rules.title: Compliance Redline
rules.abc_alert_desc: Origin A and Destination C cannot be the same. E.g., "NYC → SHA → NYC" is invalid.
rules.countries_schengen_list: Austria, Belgium, Czech, Denmark, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Italy, Netherlands, Portugal, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland...
rules.countries_americas_list: USA, Canada, Brazil, Mexico, Argentina, Chile
rules.countries_asia_list: Australia, New Zealand, Korea, Japan, Singapore...

accommodation.title: Accommodation
accommodation.subtitle: Must register within 24 hours
accommodation.content: Hotels register you automatically. If staying at Airbnb or with friends, you must register online with local police.

payment.title: Payment Guide
payment.subtitle: Link cards to Alipay/WeChat
payment.content: Highly recommend downloading Alipay International. Supports Visa/Mastercard. Free for transactions under 200 RMB.

internet.title: Network Access
internet.subtitle: eSIM Roaming for firewall
internet.content: Use eSIMs like Airalo for roaming data. It bypasses the firewall, allowing access to Google/Instagram.

transport.title: Transportation
transport.subtitle: 12306 & DiDi Apps
transport.content: Official Rail App is 12306. For local rides, use DiDi Greater China (English version available).

digital_survival.title: Digital Survival
digital_survival.payment_setup_desc: Pay like a local without cash

eligibility.title: China Visa Eligibility Checker (2026)
eligibility.description: Check if you are eligible for the 240-hour visa-free transit or 15/30-day visa-free entry.
eligibility.heading: Check Your Eligibility
eligibility.subheading: Find out if you can travel to China visa-free with the latest 2026 policies.

result.desc_15d: You can enter China without a visa for up to 15 days for business, tourism, family visit and transit.
result.desc_30d: You can enter China without a visa for up to 30 days for business, tourism, family visit and transit.
result.desc_240h: You are eligible for the 240-hour (10-day) visa-free transit policy. Please ensure you meet the A → B → C transit rule.
result.desc_visa: You likely need a visa to enter China. Please check with your local Chinese embassy.
result.abc_reminder: Remember the A → B → C rule: You must have a confirmed ticket to a third country (C) different from your origin (A).
result.disclaimer: This tool is for reference only. Please consult official sources for the most accurate information.
